author: Wayrion (718395193090375700)
description: A cog to automatically parse and embed media links in chat.
name: MediaParser
install_msg:
Thank you for instaling the MediaParser cog!. If you need support feel free to reach out to me in the #support (<#992344272529535087>) of this server.
https://discord.gg/aYd3ZPr4Dn. For this cog, please ensure to download FFMPEG and add it as a path variable.
